POST /api/register - User registration with validation

GET /api/users/:id - Get single user by ID

PUT /api/users/:id - Update existing user and interests
DELETE /api/users/:id - Delete user (cascade deletes interests)
GET /api/users/lookups - Get dropdown values (genders states cities etc.)
GET /api/users/excel-template - Generate and download Excel template
POST /api/users/bulk - Upload and process Excel file (dryRun parameter for validation)
